gameNetwork

Class Packet

  • java.lang.Object
    • gameNetwork.Packet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Packet
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Packet class contains player information which will be exchanged over connection between server and client.
    Author:
    Wendell (wendel), Jiaheng Wang (wangjiah)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • Packet

        public Packet(GameMap map)
        Constructor for sending a packet with only a map
        Parameters:
        map - the GameMap to send

      • Packet

        public Packet(PlayerCharacter pc,
              GameMap map)
        Constructor for sending a packet with both a player and the map. Should be used to update the client
        Parameters:
        pc - the PlayerCharacter to send
        map - the GameMap to send

      • Packet

        public Packet(PlayerCharacter pc)
        Constructor for sending a packet with only a player. Should be used by the server when the client requests a player.
        Parameters:
        pc - the PlayerCharacter to send

      • Packet

        public Packet(ChatMessage cm)
        Constructor for sending a chat message
        Parameters:
        cm - the ChatMessage to send

        Parameters:

        pc - the PlayerCharacter to send
        direction - the Direction to send

        Parameters:
        command - the command to send
        playerName - the playerName to send

      • Packet

        public Packet(Packet.Commands cmd)
        Constructor for commands with no arguments
        Parameters:
        cmd - the command to send

      • Packet

        public Packet(int inventoryIndex)
        Constructor for using items. Only one parameter being the index of the item in the player's inventory
        Parameters:
        inventoryIndex - the index of the item in the inventory

      • Packet

        public Packet()
        Constructor for a blank packet.

    • Method Detail

      • hasMessage

        public boolean hasMessage()
        Determine if this packet is a message packet.
        Returns:
        true if this packet is message packet, false otherwise

      • hasItem

        public boolean hasItem()

      • hasMap

        public boolean hasMap()
        Determine if this packet is only the packet carrying the world object
        Returns:
        true if this packet contains world object, false otherwise

      • hasCommand

        public boolean hasCommand()
        Determine if this packet contains command message
        Returns:
        true if this packet contains command message, false otherwise

      • isEmpty

        public boolean isEmpty()
        Determine if this packet is empty
        Returns:
        true if this packet is empty, false otherwise

      • isAction

        public boolean isAction()
        Determine if this packet is for event. It is usually purposed for renderer
        Returns:
        true is this is event packet, false otherwise
